title: Makusani's Lesson
description: Makusani's Lesson is a Venezuelan folktale that tells the story of Makusani, a very curious young boy. Makusani is a good boy, but his curiosity always seems to get him in trouble. His choices lead him on an adventure that eventually teaches him a valuable lesson.
highFrequencyWords: blowgun, curious, relieved, repeatedly, restless, wandered
